articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Choe Song Chon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Choe Song Chon
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Sunday sent a wreath to the bier of Academician, Prof. and Dr. Choe Song Chon, who is winner of Kim Jong Il Prize and the title of People's Scientist and researcher in the Green Architecture Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: DPRK Minister of Public Health on Cooperation
articles.content:
DPRK Minister of Public Health on Cooperation
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, is taking part in the 70th World Health Assembly held in Geneva of Switzerland from May 22 to 31.
					 During the assembly, Kang Ha Guk met the newly-elected director-general and vice-director generals of the World Health Organization and health ministers of Cuba, Angola, Congo and other countries to discuss the issues for boosting cooperation in the field of health.
					
					 They highly appreciated that the DPRK has recently built modern health service facilities one after another to pursue the popular health policy by further increasing the investment.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation on International Cooperation in Reducing Disaster Danger
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation on International Cooperation in Reducing Disaster Danger 
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Chairman Kang Il Sop of the DPRK State Emergency Disaster Committee who is leading a delegation of the committee made a speech at the meeting of delegation heads of the world forum for reduction of disaster danger being held in Mexico on May 26.
					 He said that the work for disaster prevention in the DPRK has ceaselessly taken place as all-people work in every field of social life based on attaching importance to the people and as a result state disaster prevention and counter-action system have been established in order and permanently operated according to each field, region, period and type.
					
					 He expressed thanks to governments and peoples of each state, several international bodies and organizations for the material and moral assistance to the DPRK government in its efforts for recovering from the unprecedentedly flood-hit northern parts of North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK government has achieved not small advance in the course taking practical measures to further develop the disaster danger reduction work and performing them in concordance with the international agreement such as Sendai framework document in the past period of a little over two years.
					
					 Its government will as ever continue to make efforts to carry out goals and tasks represented in the above-said document ahead of schedule strictly based on attaching importance to the people and positively cooperate with governments and organizations of each state and international organizations.
					
					 It is important to ensure a favorable environment for the international cooperation and development in the disaster danger reduction work, but now in the international arena illegal and unethical actions are being committed without reserve depriving the right of sovereign states for the development and existence, for unjust political, economic and military aims.
					
					 He calls for never allowing any unilateral sanctions and isolation policy against specified countries to have negative influence on the international cooperation work for disaster danger reduction.

articles.title: Crown Prince of Liechtenstein Principality on Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Crown Prince of Liechtenstein Principality on Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Han Tae Song, DPRK ambassador to the Liechtenstein Principality, presented his credentials to Alois Von Und Zu Liechtenstein, crown prince of the Liechtenstein Principality, on May 24.
					 The crown prince rejoiced at the fact that everything goes well in the DPRK.
					
					 He wished the Korean people bigger success in the economic construction and the work for improvement of the people's living, and hoped that the bilateral relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop.

articles.title: Answer of Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Distributed as Document of UN General Assembly and UNSC
articles.content:
Answer of Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Distributed as Document of UN General Assembly and UNSC
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- An answer given by a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK which categorically rejected the press statement of the UN Security Council pulling up the DPRK's test-fire of its ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 was distributed as an official document A/71/906-S/2017/429 of the UN General Assembly and the UNSC on May 26.

articles.title: New Functional Nutritive Supplements for Children Produced
articles.content:
New Functional Nutritive Supplements for Children Produced
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory in the DPRK is now producing new kinds of functional nutritive supplements promoting the mental development and growth of children.
					 They include powdered soya milk for mental development, powdered soya-peptide milk, powdered soya milk with sesame flavor and powdered fish bone.
					
					 Those products were proved to be effective in promoting mental development, raising the rate of digestion and absorption, restraining the formation of preoxidized fat and decreasing the content of harmful cholesterol.
					
					 They are also good for weight increase and nourishment administration.

articles.title: South Hwanghae Province in Van of Land Management Campaign
articles.content:
South Hwanghae Province in Van of Land Management Campaign
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Amid the brisk spring campaign for land management in the DPRK, South Hwanghae Province is taking the lead in it.
					 The province has pushed ahead with the construction of tree nurseries, production of saplings, tree-planting and forest-fire prevention, while repairing banks along the scores of medium and small streams, dredging their beds and creating bank-protecting forests to prevent flood damage.
					
					 It also finished such projects as repair of seawalls, land realignment, field terracing and clean-up of waterways in several areas to create favorable conditions for agricultural production.
					
					 Road pavement and repair of bridges, culverts, revetments and sidewalks are being carried on to face-lift Haeju City, provincial seat, and county seats.
					
					 In particular, Kangryong County finished the improvement of the Kangryong Stream, extension of the width of sidewalks in its seat and repair of revetment and is building more than 60 dwelling houses and 4 km-long standard highroad.
					
					 Haeju City concentrates big efforts on the construction of an industrial waste water treatment ground and road administration.
					
					 And its streets were decorated with electric lights in a peculiar way to add beauty to the port city.

articles.title: American-style Bluff No Longer Workable: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
American-style Bluff No Longer Workable: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is making desperate efforts to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK on the Korean peninsula.
					 Recently the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group extended the period of joint drill with USS Carl Vinson nuclear powered carrier involved till the end of June, groundlessly taking issue with the DPRK's just step for bolstering its military capability for self-defence. And they plan to stage the largest-ever naval joint military drill of their nuclear carrier strike groups from early June with introduction of another nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan.
					
					 This is a dangerous military action driving the acute situation of the Korean peninsula to the point of explosion, an indication that the U.S. and south Korean warmongers' scheme for invasion of the north has reached to the extremes.
					
					 The U.S. bluffed that the drill would display the strong will to deter the possible military provocation from the DPRK. This shows that its talk about "dialogue" is nothing but deception and that the ambition of the aggressors for a nuclear war against the DPRK has remained unchanged. Earlier, the U.S. said that it has no intent to invade and replace the regime in the north but will guarantee its system.
					
					 Clouds of a nuclear war are hanging heavily above the Korean nation owing to the reckless war drills staged one after another in the sky, land and sea of south Korea.
					
					The U.S., together with south Korea, had conducted the joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 17 across south Korea for more than 60 days from March 1, with large nuclear strategic assets, including the above-said nuclear power carriers, and more than 300,000 aggressor troops involved.
					
					 The U.S. is busy mulling to form a special task brigade for "beheading operation" in contingency within this year, after deploying Apache attack copter unit of the U.S. forces in south Korea in the hotspot waters in the West Sea.
					
					 Watching a flock of birds flying towards the south, the south Korean puppet forces fired hundreds of machine gun bullets into the DPRK side, claiming they spotted "unidentified flying object crossing the Military Demarcation Line".
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers should stop the reckless acts aggravating the situation, mindful that they would bring only final destruction to them.
					
					 The U.S. advertises that a nuclear powered carrier strike group is capable of carrying out a whole war. Its scheme for joint military exercises with such two strike groups involved will only make the DPRK's nuclear weapons target the mainland of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK will remain unperturbed even in the face of all the U.S. nuclear strategic assets coming to attack.
					
					 The American-style bluff is no longer workable.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Calls for Removal of "Preparatory Committee for Unification"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Calls for Removal of "Preparatory Committee for Unification"
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are showing the sign of keeping the "Preparatory Committee for Unification", set up during the Park Geun Hye regime.
					 They seek to change its title to the "People's Committee for Unification", claiming that it is needed to maintain the function and role of the former committee meant to "get ready for unification by taking deep breath".
					
					 This connivance at the crimes against the reunification which brought about indelible consequence to the nation is a clear revelation of the stand of the present south Korean authorities to the reunification, the cherished desire of the nation and crucial issue.
					
					 The "Preparatory Committee for Unification" has served as a means for executing the policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen by traitor Park Geun Hye, which put the worst obstacles in the way of the country's reunification. It remains like a dagger stabbed in the chest of the nation for its original purport and reactionary nature.
					
					 In 2014, Park set up the "Committee" as a panel directly under the control of "president" while crying out for "getting ready for unification" and "good chance for unification" in pursuance of her ambition for "unification through absorption".
					
					 The formation of the "Committee" was for realizing the ambition for "unification by prevailing over communism", touted by her father "yusin" dictator.
					
					 The traitor, buoyed by the dream of "unification through absorption", went desperate to work out the policies for escalating stand-off between social systems after setting up the body.
					
					 The "second framed work for developing south-north ties" was confirmed, totally scrapping the issues which were stipulated in the October 4 declaration and the north and the south agreed to implement, typically the issue of setting up the special zone for peace and cooperation in West Sea, the issue of ending the current armistice system and building lasting peace mechanism.
					
					 Not satisfied with the total denial of the north-south declarations, Park let the distorted segment of north-south summit minutes go public. She raked up human scum-like defectors from the north to malignantly slander the dignity and social system of the DPRK and stage anti-DPRK human rights smear campaign. She called for confrontation with the north abroad while harshly cracking down the forces supporting the June 15 declaration as part of her stepped-up racket for eliminating the "forces following the north".
					
					 Bound by the spell of the ghost-like shaman that "unification will come within a few years", she trumpeted about "blueprint of peaceful reunification" and unsparingly shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone, a product of the June 15 era that had barely been maintained.
					
					 The successive south Korean conservative forces were all hell-bent on escalating confrontation with the north but never have there been such anti-reunification traitors like Park Geun Hye group which went desperate even by setting up "team for unification through absorption" involving those in authority, in political circle and non-government field.
					
					 As differing ideologies and systems have existed for long in the north and the south, attempt at achieving "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption" by way of extending the system of one party into the other party will only bring conflict.
					
					 It is the unanimous wish of the Koreans that the "Preparatory Committee" has to be removed just like its inventor sternly punished by history.
					
					 It is never a matter of sign. Deposit will give harm to people and surroundings if it is not cleaned in time.
					
					 Those keen on prolonging the confrontation policy of Park Geun Hye group will meet the same miserable fate as their predecessors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Speeding up Sci-Tech Drive like Defence Industrial Workers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Speeding up Sci-Tech Drive like Defence Industrial Workers
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls for putting fresh spurs to a drive for implementing the decision of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea by remaining intensely loyal to the Party's idea of prioritizing science and technology like the scientists, technicians and officials in the field of defense industry.
					 Praising the defense industrial workers as Juche-type revolutionaries, true patriots and the most admirable heroes as they have devotedly carried into practice the WPK's idea of building a Juche-based nuclear power and prioritizing science and technology, the editorial says:
					
					 Their painstaking efforts to develop perfectly the powerful Juche weapons such as new ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket cannot be characterized by a simple campaign of brains and technology, and it was a life-and-death struggle for paving the untrodden path.
					
					 Fully determined to defend the prestige of the Party Central Committee and bolster up the country's military capability for self-defense with the sci-tech might, they successfully developed only in a few months the new-type high-thrust engine, whose development is considered in general to take ten years or 7 or 8 years at least, and gave birth to "Juche weapons" one after another.
					
					 When everyone and any sector and any unit of the country give priority to science and technology, world-startling events will take place in succession and the cause of building a socialist power will make steady progress.

articles.title: DPRK Will Surely Win in Showdown with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Surely Win in Showdown with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are resolutely smashing the challenges by the enemy through a steady offensive no matter how desperately the enemy move to do harm to the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 Noting the DPRK has already emerged a politico-ideological power, military power, space power and nuclear power, the article goes on:
					
					 The structure of standoff between the DPRK and the U.S. has turned into that of nuclear standoff and the DPRK's nuclear deterrent serving as the best guarantee for the eternal prosperity of the nation and global peace is getting stronger with the passage of time.
					
					 Today the DPRK is fully ready to counter any form of war, operation and combat the U.S. imperialists want to choose.
					
					 It is the toughest will of Songun Korea to make the enemy sustain the most terrible horror and bitterest defeat on their mainland if they are to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last.
					
					 The DPRK had access to the substantial ultra-modern nuclear attack capability in order to put a definite end to the decades-long confrontation with the U.S., sweep away the "doctrine of strength and sanctions almighty" and establish a just and fair international order.
					
					 It will as ever produce more excellent Korean-style Juche weapons and nuclear strike means to strike terror into the enemy and annihilate them by steadily and dauntlessly making innovations and advance in its offensive for firmly consolidating the defence capability and nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that time and justice are in favor of the DPRK.
					
					 The all-out confrontation with the U.S. has not yet ended but the victory is just in store for the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Scheme to Keep Anti-Reunification Body Criticized
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Scheme to Keep Anti-Reunification Body Criticized
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The present authorities of south Korea seek to keep the former regime's "preparatory committee for unification" by renaming it "people's committee for unification", asserting that it is needed to preserve the "preparatory committee's" function and role and they would examine how to operate it.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Monday says it is an anti-reunification act against the aspiration and demand of all Koreans for a new phase of independent reunification through early removal of mistrust and confrontation between the north and the south and improvement of their relations.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Talking about "readiness for unification", traitor Park Geun Hye cooked up the "committee" with all sorts of riff-raff to invent scenarios for "unification of systems", which hurt the nation's reconciliation and unity and escalated distrust and confrontation between the north and the south to an extreme phase.
					
					 Accordingly, this illegal plot-breeding body should have been disbanded with ruin of traitor Park hell-bent on the anti-reunification moves.
					
					 However, the present south Korean authorities are going to maintain it under the pretext that the "budget related to it has been already allotted". This is an act of going against the mindset of candlelight demonstrators.
					
					 The nature of such confrontation body can never be changed through renaming or "examination of its orientation and contents".
					
					 Those seeking to keep it with change of name and prolong the confrontational policy of Park will face the same wretched fate as the traitor's, the commentary warns.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves to Link Ransomware with DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves to Link Ransomware with DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The cyber-attack ransomware happened in various countries of the world at same time about on May 12. 
					 The U.S. raised groundless assertion that the DPRK was behind the cyber attack.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary terms the assertion vicious action to dampen the image and dignity of the DPRK and stifle it at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to link the case with the DPRK again, far from drawing a lesson in the hacking incident of the Sony Pictures Entertainment in 2014. This is aimed to make a pretext for escalating the sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. to find a way out in the method of fabricating charade in a bid to accuse others whenever it is faced with crisis.
					
					 The U.S. is now making last-ditch efforts to put the largest military threat and blackmail and brutal sanctions and blockade upon the DPRK.
					
					 Whenever something shocking happens, the U.S. would make efforts to label the DPRK as criminal and justify the sanctions and moves to stifle the DPRK, but this brings to light only its true colors as evil empire and kingpin of fabrications.
					
					 And such moves will only harden the Korean army and people's will to win in the final anti-U.S. confrontation.

articles.title: S. Koreans Demand Withdrawal of THAAD and Improved North-South Relations
articles.content:
S. Koreans Demand Withdrawal of THAAD and Improved North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Women organizations in Pusan of south Korea reportedly held a press conference outside the U.S. consulate in Pusan on May 24 to demand the withdrawal of THAAD and scrapping of bio-chemical war equipment.
					 Speakers at the conference stressed the need to immediately abolish the bio-chemical lab for "Jupiter Plan" at Dock 8 of Pusan Port.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once THAAD deployment threatening the peace of the Korean peninsula, they stated.
					
					 They also urged the south Korean regime to work for south-north dialogue and peace agreement, rather than THAAD deployment.
					
					 They stressed that the regime should stop policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and mend the inter-Korean relations, which had been suspended for one decade, through dialogue and negotiations.

articles.title: S. Korea: Abolishment of Evils in Media Field Demanded
articles.content:
S. Korea: Abolishment of Evils in Media Field Demanded
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council of Media Organs in south Korea held a press conference at Kwanghwamun Plaza of Seoul on May 26 to declare a struggle for abolishment of evils in the media field, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers at the conference demanded for investigation into the truth about the media control in the period of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye administrations, punishment of the culprits, reinstatement of the dismissed, adoption of a law preventing media control, etc.
					
					 They urged the culprits of evils in the media field including Ko Yong Ju, director of the Council for Promoting Broadcasting Services and Culture, to step down at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Choe Song Chon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Choe Song Chon
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 28 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Choe Song Chon, laureado con el Premio Kim Jong Il, Cientifico del Pueblo, Academico, Profesor Titular, Doctor e investigador del Instituto de Arquitectura Verde de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Diplomatico coreano conversa con el director del MINREX eslovaco
articles.content:
Diplomatico coreano conversa con el director del MINREX eslovaco
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El titular de la Direccion No.2 de Europa del MINREX de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Son Gyong, departio el dia 26 con el director de Asia y el Pacifico del MINREX de Eslovaquia, Marian Tomasik, en la sede de esta cartera.
					   La parte coreana explico la posicion de la RPDC de desarrollar positivamente las relaciones entre los dos paises y sus esfuerzos por aliviar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y asegurar la paz y estabilidad de la region.
					
					   La parte eslovaca senalo que el pueblo eslovaco tiene el sentimiento amistoso al pueblo coreano y expuso la voluntad de continuar el dialogo e intercambio bilaterales con vistas a fomentar el entendimiento mutuo y desarrollar las relaciones.
					
					   Expresando preocupacion por la peligrosa coyuntura en que va cayendo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, apunto que en la actualidad, el dialogo y negociaciones constituyen el unico remedio para relajar la tension y resolver el problema.

articles.title: Ministro coreano de salud publica discute asuntos de cooperacion
articles.content:
Ministro coreano de salud publica discute asuntos de cooperacion 
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- La delegacion coreana encabezada por Kang Ha Guk, ministro de Salud Publica, participa en la septuagesima sesion plenaria de la asamblea de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud (OMS), que se efectua del 22 al 31 de mayo en Genova de Suiza.
					En esta ocasion Kang se reunio con el nuevo director general y subdirectores generales de la OMS y con sus homologos de varios paises incluyendo Cuba, Angola y Congo para discutir los asuntos de ampliar y desarrollar la cooperacion en la rama de salud publica.
					
					Los miembros directivos de la OMS y los ministros de salud publica de varios paises apreciaron el hecho de que la RPDC incremento la inversion en el sector sanitario, construyo una tras otra las modernas instalaciones sanitarias y practica la politica popular de salud publica.

articles.title: Kang Il Sop insiste en fomentar cooperacion para reduccion de riesgos de desastre
articles.content:
Kang Il Sop insiste en fomentar cooperacion para reduccion de riesgos de desastre 
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Estatal de Calamidades de Emergencia de Corea, Kang Il Sop, quien preside la delegacion de su entidad, pronuncio el dia 26 un discurso durante la reunion de los jefes de delegaciones del forum mundial sobre la reduccion de riesgos de desastre que tiene lugar en Mexico. 
					Dijo que la prevencion de desastres en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tiene lugar constantemente en todas las esferas de vida social como una labor de todo el pueblo ateniendose a la politica de dar importancia al pueblo.
					
					Como resultado, opera en todo el tiempo el ordenado sistema estatal de prevencion y reaccion a los desastres para diferentes sectores, zonas, periodos y formas, senalo. 
					
					Expreso agradecimiento a los gobiernos y pueblos de varios paises y a las organizaciones internacionales y entidades que brindaron la ayuda material y mental a los esfuerzos del gobierno de la RPDC por reparar los danos reportados en las zonas septentrionales. 
					
					Menciono que en los ultimos dos anos y pico, el gobierno de la RPDC ha tomado medidas practicas para reducir los peligros de desastre conforme a los acuerdos internacionales, incluso el documento marco de trabajo de Sendai, y ha alcanzado muchos exitos en el proceso de su implementacion. 
					
					Enfatizo que en el futuro tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC seguira esforzandose por cumplir con antelacion las metas y tareas indicadas en dicho documento de Sendai ateniendose estrictamente a la politica de dar importancia al pueblo, y para este fin, estrechara la cooperacion con los gobiernos y entidades de los paises y las organizaciones internacionales. 
					
					Es importante asegurar el ambiente favorable al desarrollo de la cooperacion internacional para la reduccion de riesgos de desastre, dijo y revelo que en la actualidad, se cometen en la arena internacional las acciones ilegales y antieticas para usurpar el derecho al desarrollo y hasta el de subsistencia de los Estados soberanos en funcion de los injustos objetivos politicos, economicos y militares. 
					
					Exhorto que no toleren nunca la influencia negativa de la politica de sancion unilateral y aislamiento contra los paises especificos sobre la cooperacion internacional en la reduccion de riesgos de desastre.

articles.title: Sucesor de rey de Liechtenstein desea desarrollo de relaciones con RPDC
articles.content:
Sucesor de rey de Liechtenstein desea desarrollo de relaciones con RPDC
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- Han Tae Song presento el dia 24 ante el sucesor del rey del Principado de Liechtenstein, Alois Von Und Zu, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en este pais.
					  El sucesor expreso la alegria de que todos marchan bien en la RPDC y deseo que el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en la construccion economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo y sigan desarrollandose favorablemente las relaciones bilaterales entre los dos paises.
